09-26-2024: - Fixed refresher not working properly with {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb
- Fixed some items that didn't proc before: {{ItemIcon|Item=Tesla Bullets|Size=20}} Tesla Bullets, {{ItemIcon|Item=Lucky Shot|Size=20}} Lucky Shot, {{ItemIcon|Item=Mystic Shot|Size=20}} Mystic Shot
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance now more accurately shows who it is shooting
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance sometimes not obeying line of sight accurately
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance bullets are now affected by {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Time Wall|Size=20}} Time Wall
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance evasion reduced from 50% to 25%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance fire rate reduced from 25% to 15%
09-12-2024: - Fixed issues with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger hitting targets behind walls
08-29-2024: - Base bullet damage increased from 5.3 to 5.6
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger impact damage happens immediately, rather than after the brief drowsy period
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger drowsy period before sleep kicks in increased from 0.25 to 0.35
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger cooldown reduced from 27s to 25s
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb radius reduced from 20m to 18m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Fixation|Size=20}} Fixation T2 max stacks increased from +30 to +40
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance now provides +2 Weapon Damage in the base ability (similar to the T1)
08-15-2024: - Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger cast, projectile loop and whizby
- Updated {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb sound
- Removed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb voice line for everyone except the casting player and spectators

- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger now puts you in a brief drowsy state for 0.25s seconds where you move slowly before falling asleep (you still have the ability to shoot/cast/move/etc during this period)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance T1 increased from +6 to +7
08-01-2024: - Bullet damage falloff is now 20% more falloff than default
- Can now cast {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb while on zipline
07-18-2024: - Base ammo increased by 5% (except for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Wraith|Size=20}} Wraith)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger min sleep time reduced from 0.3 to 0.2
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger wake-up time reduced from 0.15 to 0.1
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger projectile size reduced by 10%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Fixation|Size=20}} Fixation damage per stack reduced from 0.25 to 0.2
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance fire rate increased from +20% to +25%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance radius increased from 14m to 15m
07-11-2024: - Global base Ammo increased by 5% (except for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Wraith|Size=20}} Wraith and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze)
- Ammo scaling with spirit power reduced from 0.6 to 0.5
06-27-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance T1 increased from +5 Weapon Damage to +6
- Fixed various bugs with the fire rate on {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance (net effect of the bugs was that it often fired a little faster than it was intended to)
06-20-2024: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Grey Talon|Size=20}} Grey Talon: Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Charged Shot|Size=20}} Charged Shot being evaded by {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger cooldown reduced from 29s to 27s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger T2 cooldown changed from -15s to -13s
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb T2 changed to "Replenishes stamina on cast and grants +40% Stamina Regen"
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Fixation|Size=20}} Fixation bonus damage no longer ignores bullet falloff
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance cast point reduced from 0.8s to 0.4s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance move speed increased from 3.5 to 4
06-13-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger damage Spirit growth increased from 2.5 to 2.8
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger T3 is now -12% Bullet Resistance for 6 seconds
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb T1 increased from +4 m/s Invis Sprint Speed to +5
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb causes your footsteps to be silent
06-06-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger T3 damage reduction on target improved from -30% to -40%
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb sprint speed now instantly kicks in after casting it
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance cooldown reduced from 160s to 130s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance T2 changed to -40s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance T3 changed to +1 Targets Hit Per Shot
05-30-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger cooldown increased from 27 to 29
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger spirit scaling increased from 2.2 to 2.5
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb T2 and T3 swapped
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb T3 cooldown improved from -20s to -25s
05-23-2024: - Added unique {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze footstep sound effects
- Improved visibility of {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze’s bullet and travel path
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger no longer breaks invisibility when cast (previously was part of the T3)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger Spirit scaling increased from 2.3 to 2.6
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger no longer gets +140 damage with the T3
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger T3 is now "-30% Damage Penalty On Victim for 4s after wakeup"
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance cast time increased from 0.7s to 0.8s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance evasion from 70% to 50%
05-16-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger cooldown increased from 25s to 27s
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb cooldown reduced from 45s to 35s
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb T1 changed to +4 Invis Sprint
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb T2 is now -20s Cooldown

- {{ItemIcon|Item=Smoke|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Smoke Bomb|Size=20}} Smoke Bomb duration scaling from Spirit improved from 0.2 to 0.3
